from: I couldn’t open the pickles, so I asked my roommate to do it.
to: Nisam mogao da otvorim kisele krastavce, pa sam zamolio svog cimera da to uradi.

from: They pushed their ideas on me and I did not do anything.
to: Oni su mi gurali svoje ideje i nisam ništa uradio.

from: When I got bitten by the lion, I didn't hesitate and tended to my wound.
to: Kada me je lav ugrizao, nisam oklevao i zbrisao sam ranu.

from: I felt that taking care of house was always my responsibility.
to: Osjećao sam da je briga o kući uvijek bila moja odgovornost.

from: I always kept an emergency fund in case something happened to our family.
to: Uvijek sam držao fond za hitne slučajeve u slučaju da se nešto desi našoj porodici.
Nikada nisam voleo da se sukobljavam sa nekim.

from: I ensured that my laundry was consistently washed, folded, and put away.
to: Osigurala sam da se moj veš dosljedno pere, presavija i odlaže.

from: I have always been a leadership type.
In any relationship, I was always the submissive one.
to: U bilo kojoj vezi, ja sam uvek bila pokorna.
